item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown Including Plots R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.

item.title: About me
item.description: Where I’m at. Some of my code. Talk to me. A snapshot of my CV. Awards and honors Teaching experience Publications and presentations Where I’m at. I’m currently a PhD student in Dr. Kevin Ochsner’s Social Cognitive & Affective Neuroscience Lab at Columbia University, where I began in fall 2017. While I’m not working on research (and often while I am), I’m probably drinking from a very large cup of tea.

item.title: Game shows
item.description: (2012) Jeopardy! College Championship (2013) Jeopardy! Tournament of Champions (2016) 500 Questions, season 2 (2019) Jeopardy! All-Star Games When I was little, instead of doing normal kid things, I would read piles upon piles of nonfiction books about history and science. Somehow, a lot of this academic detritus has collected and stuck in my head over the years (hopefully useful for a PhD student?), and when combined with embarrassing volumes of angsty mid-2000s pop-punk lyrics, it turns out I know a lot of random stuff.

item.title: Research
item.description: Research tools Recruiting online participants Running behavioral tasks online Active projects Individual differences in age perception Measurement of emotion self-reporting Previous projects Attention, memory, and media multitasking Healthy aging and associative memory Research tools Recruiting online participants I recently started using prolific.co, a researcher-friendly website for online behavioral study recruitment that’s kind both to researchers and to participants. All my contacts with participants have been pleasant, and the Prolific support staff are so responsive and helpful.
